category: news
title: "AI in Retail - automating supply chain management and fulfillment at Wakefern and Loblaws"
excerpt: "COVID-19 and the subsequent panic-buying and societal shift to online shopping put enormous pressures on retail industry supply chain management and inventory control. An increasing number of retailers are looking to AI and machine learning tech to automate back-end processes to ensure that they can always meet customer demand."
